title: Poongkaatrilae Song Lyrics Uyire
stanzas:
Poongaatrile un swasathai
thaniyaaga thaedi paarthen
kadalin mel oru thuli veelndhadhe
adhai thaedi thaedi paarthen

uyirin thuli kaayum munne
en vizhi unai kaanum kanne
en jeevan oayum munne
oadodi vaa....

Poongaatrile un swasathai
thaniyaaga thaedi paarthen
kadalin mel oru thuli veelndhadhe

Kaatrin Alaivarisai ketkindratha
kaetkum paatil oru uyir
vidum kanneer valikindratha
nenju nenaikindrathaa
idhayam karugum oru
vaasam varugirathaa

kaatril kanneerai yaetri
kavidhai sendhenai ootri
kanne un vaasal serthen
oayum jeevam oadum munne
oadoadi vaa...

Poongaatrile un swasathai
thaniyaaga thaedi paarthen
kadalin mel oru thuli veelndhadhe

uyirin thuli kaayum munne
en vizhi unai kaanum kanne
en jeevan oayum munne
oadodi vaa.

Poongaatrile un swasathai
thaniyaaga thaedi paarthen
kadalin mel oru thuli veelndhadhe

Vaanam engum un binbam
aanaal kaiyyil seravillai
kaatril engum un vaasam
verum vaasam vazhkai illai

uyirai vaerodu killi
en sendheeyil thalli
engae sendraayo kalli
oayum jeevan odum munne
oadodi vaa....

Poongaatrile un swasathai
thaniyaaga thaedi paarthen
kadalin mel oru thuli veelndhadhe
adhai thaedi thaedi paarthen

uyirin thuli kaayum munne
en vizhi unai kaanum kanne
en jeevan oayum munne
oadodi vaa....

Poongaatrile un swasathai
thaniyaaga thaedi paarthen
kadalin mel oru thuli veelndhadhe
adhai thaedi thaedi paarthen

seo.title: Poongkaatrilae Song Lyrics Uyire
seo.description: Get the complete Poongkaatrilae Song Lyrics Uyire from Uyire. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and composed by AR Rahman and sung by Swarnalatha. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vairamuthu, Uyire, AR Rahman, Swarnalatha, Unni Menon, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
